data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85)) AS 'Health Score' FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node FACET netapp_solidfire_storage_node_name
SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_solidfire_storage_node_name) AS 'Storage Nodes' FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node FACET netapp_solidfire_cluster_name

presentation.title: Cluster Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Cluster of this Storage Node

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_solidfire_storage_node_name) AS 'Storage Nodes' FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node FACET model
SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_solidfire_storage_node_name) AS 'Storage Nodes' FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node FACET software_version

presentation.title: Software Version Distribution
presentation.notes: Returns the current version of Element OS software running on the node.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(total_memory_usage) FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(read_latency_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Latency (Microseconds per Second)
presentation.notes: Total time spent performing read operations on the node.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_latency_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Latency (Microseconds per Second)
presentation.notes: Total time spent performing write operations on the node.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_operations_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Operations (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: Total read operations of the node.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_operations_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_storage_node COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Operations (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: Total write operations of the node.
